narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. Applicant meets the minimum requirements for a Class C
exhibitor.
In addition the following items were discussed medical records, record keeping requirements for animals, personnel
monitoring animals when visitors are present.  
Applicant is a seasonal exhibitor open from Mar to Oct 
In order to complete the licensing process the applicant needs to forward a check for the appropriate amount to the
USDA office listed below.
USDA-APHIS-AC
920 Main Campus Dr
suite 200 
Raleigh NC 27606  phone 919 855-7100
Exit interview conducted with the owner
